creator.description:
Subscribe to the labeler and like a post with your faction (only one for now)!

Find them in the Posts tab of my profile, or search for @brightershores.pds.malpercio.dev.

See the pinned post to delete your label.

contact: @malpercio.dev

locales.description: Guardians are users of Arborae magic. Guardians use weapons and armour crafted from bone and deal primarily Arborae damage. Guardians are strong against Hammermages but weak against Cryoknights.
locales.name: Guardian

locales.description: Cryoknights are users of Cryonae magic. Cryoknights are focused on melee combat, using weapons like swords alongside a shield. Cryoknights are strong against Guardians but weak against Hammermages.
locales.name: Cryoknight

locales.description: Hammermages are users of Tempestae magic. Hammermages use hammers (shocker) and armour crafted from stone and deal primarily Tempestae magic. Hammermages are strong against Cryoknights but weak against Guardians.
locales.name: Hammermage
